query:
-- Insert test patients
INSERT INTO patients (name, phone, email, clinic_id) VALUES
('Juan Pérez', '+595981234567', 'juan@test.com', 1),
('María González', '+595982345678', 'maria@test.com', 1),
('Carlos López', '+595983456789', 'carlos@test.com', 1),
('Ana Martínez', '+595984567890', 'ana@test.com', 1),
('Pedro Rodríguez', '+595985678901', 'pedro@test.com', 1);

SELECT @patient1 := LAST_INSERT_ID();

-- Insert test appointments with different statuses
INSERT INTO appointments (patient_id, appointment_date, treatment_type, chair, status, clinic_id) VALUES
(@patient1, NOW(), 'orthodontic_treatment', 'sillon_1_oro', 'scheduled', 1),
(@patient1+1, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR), 'general_clinic', 'sillon_2_oro', 'confirmed', 1),
(@patient1+2, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 HOUR), 'orthodontic_treatment', 'sillon_3_oro', 'completed', 1),
(@patient1+3, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 HOUR), 'marketing_evaluation', 'evaluacion_marketing', 'cancelled', 1),
(@patient1+4, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 4 HOUR), 'general_clinic', 'sillon_1_clinico', 'no_show', 1);
